page.title: 07THE PUBS AND THE CLUB
page.content: THERE ARE 2 PUBS IN HANSLOPE.ONE IS THE COCK INN AND THE OTHER PUB IS THE WATTS ARMS.THERE IS A CLUB IN HANSLOPE CALLED HANSLOPE WORKMEN'S CLUB.THE COCK INN IS IN THE HIGH STREET.THE OWNER IS MR PD HARRISON.OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK.OPENING TIMES MON-SAT 10.30-2.30 6-11.SUN 12-2 7-10.30.IT SELLS WINES,SPIRITS & CON- FECTIONERY.THE BUILDING IS 54 YEARS OLD THAT MEANS THE PRESENT BUILDING.THEY GET THEIR SUPPLIES FROM NORTHAMPTON.4 PEOPLE WORK THERE.THE WATTS ARMS HAS A YARD WITH SOME SWINGS IN IT.IT'S UP CASTLETHORPE RD.ITS OWNER IS MR SEYMOUR & IT'S OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK.IT WAS BUILT IN 1579 & HAS ABOUT 100 CUSTOMERS A DAY.THE WORKMEN'S CLUB IS IN THE HIGH ST AND IS ABOUT 200 YEARS OLD.IT HAS ABOUT 900 CUSTOMERS A DAY,SELLS BEER, WINE, MINERALS AND SPIRITS.IT HAS 10 STAFF.THEY PLAY BINGO THERE.
